verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto Aaron <WH175> and to his sons <WH1121>, that they separate <WH5144> themselves from the holy things <WH6944> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, which they hallow unto me <WH2490>, and that they profane not my holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>.

Say <WH559> unto them <WH376>, Whosoever he be of all your seed <WH2233> throughout your generations <WH1755>, that approacheth unto the holy things <WH6944>, which the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> hallow <WH6942> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, having his uncleanness <WH2932> upon him <WH5315>, that soul shall be cut off <WH3772> from before me <WH3068>: I am Jehovah.

What man soever <WH376> of the seed <WH2233> of Aaron <WH175> is a leper <WH6879>, or hath an issue <WH2100>; he shall not eat <WH398> of the holy things <WH6944>, until he be clean <WH2891>. And whoso toucheth <WH5060> anything that is unclean <WH2931> by the dead <WH5315>, or a man <WH376> whose seed <WH2233> goeth from him <WH3318>;

or whosoever <WH376> toucheth <WH5060> any creeping thing <WH8318>, whereby he may be made unclean <WH2930>, or a man <WH120> of whom he may take uncleanness <WH2930>, whatsoever uncleanness he hath <WH2932>;

the soul <WH5315> that toucheth any such shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>, and shall not eat <WH398> of the holy things <WH6944>, unless <WH518> he bathe <WH7364> his flesh <WH1320> in water <WH4325>.
And when the sun <WH8121> is down <WH935>, he shall be clean <WH2891>; and afterward <WH310> he shall eat <WH398> of the holy things <WH6944>, because it is his bread.
That which dieth of itself <WH5038>, or is torn <WH2966> of beasts <WH398>, he shall not eat, to defile <WH2930> himself therewith <WH3068>: I am Jehovah.
They shall therefore keep <WH8104> my charge <WH5375>, lest they bear sin <WH2399> for it <WH4191>, and die therein <WH2490>, if they profane it <WH3068>: I am Jehovah who sanctifieth them <WH6942>.
There shall no stranger <WH2114> eat <WH398> of the holy thing <WH6944>: a sojourner <WH8453> of the priest <WH3548>'s, or a hired servant <WH7916>, shall not eat <WH398> of the holy thing <WH6944>.

But if a priest <WH3548> buy <WH7069> any soul <WH5315>, the purchase of his money <WH3701>, he shall eat <WH398> of it <WH3211>; and such as are born in his house <WH1004>, they shall eat of his bread <WH398>.
And if a priest <WH3548>'s daughter <WH1323> be married unto a stranger <WH376>, she shall not eat <WH398> of the heave-offering <WH8641> of the holy things <WH6944>.

But if a priest <WH3548>'s daughter <WH1323> be a widow <WH490>, or divorced <WH1644>, and have no child <WH2233>, and be returned <WH7725> unto her father <WH1>'s house <WH1004>, as in her youth <WH5271>, she shall eat <WH398> of her father <WH1>'s bread <WH2114>: but there shall no stranger eat thereof <WH398>.

And if a man <WH376> eat <WH398> of the holy thing <WH6944> unwittingly <WH7684>, then he shall put <WH3254> the fifth <WH2549> part thereof unto it <WH5414>, and shall give unto the priest <WH3548> the holy thing <WH6944>.
And they shall not profane <WH2490> the holy things <WH6944> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, which they offer <WH7311> unto Jehovah <WH3068>,
and so cause them to bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> that bringeth guilt <WH819>, when they eat <WH398> their holy things <WH6944>: for I am Jehovah <WH3068> who sanctifieth them <WH6942>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto Aaron <WH175>, and to his sons <WH1121>, and unto all the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH376>, Whosoever he be of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, or of the sojourners <WH1616> in Israel <WH3478>, that offereth <WH7126> his oblation <WH7133>, whether it be any of their vows <WH5088>, or any of their freewill-offerings <WH5071>, which they offer <WH7126> unto Jehovah <WH3068> for a burnt-offering <WH5930>;
that ye may be accepted <WH7522>, ye shall offer a male <WH2145> without blemish <WH8549>, of the bullocks <WH1241>, of the sheep <WH3775>, or of the goats <WH5795>.
But whatsoever hath a blemish <WH3971>, that shall ye not offer <WH7126>: for it shall not be acceptable for you <WH7522>.

And whosoever <WH376> offereth <WH7126> a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace-offerings <WH8002> unto Jehovah <WH3068> to accomplish <WH6381> a vow <WH5088>, or for a freewill-offering <WH5071>, of the herd <WH1241> or of the flock <WH6629>, it shall be perfect <WH8549> to be accepted <WH7522>; there shall be no blemish therein <WH3971>.

Blind <WH5788>, or broken <WH7665>, or maimed <WH2782>, or having a wen <WH2990>, or scurvy <WH1618>, or scabbed <WH3217>, ye shall not offer <WH7126> these unto Jehovah <WH3068>, nor make <WH5414> an offering by fire <WH801> of them upon the altar <WH4196> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

Either a bullock <WH7794> or a lamb <WH7716> that hath anything superfluous <WH8311> or lacking in his parts <WH7038>, that mayest thou offer <WH6213> for a freewill-offering <WH5071>; but for a vow <WH5088> it shall not be accepted <WH7521>.

That which hath its stones bruised <WH4600>, or crushed <WH3807>, or broken <WH5423>, or cut <WH3772>, ye shall not offer <WH7126> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; neither shall ye do <WH6213> thus in your land <WH776>.

Neither from the hand <WH3027> of a foreigner <WH5236> shall ye offer <WH7126> the bread <WH3899> of your God <WH430> of any of these <WH4893>; because their corruption is in them <WH3971>, there is a blemish in them <WH7521>: they shall not be accepted for you.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

When a bullock <WH7794>, or a sheep <WH3775>, or a goat <WH5795>, is brought forth <WH3205>, then it shall be seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> under the dam <WH517>; and from the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> and thenceforth <WH1973> it shall be accepted <WH7521> for the oblation of an offering <WH7133> made by fire <WH801> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.
And whether it be cow <WH7794> or ewe <WH7716>, ye shall not kill <WH7819> it and its young <WH1121> both in one <WH259> day <WH3117>.
And when ye sacrifice <WH2077> a sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, ye shall sacrifice <WH2077> it that ye may be accepted <WH7522>.
On the same day <WH3117> it shall be eaten <WH398>; ye shall leave <WH3498> none of it until the morning <WH1242>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>.
Therefore shall ye keep <WH8104> my commandments <WH4687>, and do <WH6213> them <WH3068>: I am Jehovah.

And ye shall not profane <WH2490> my holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>; but I will be hallowed <WH6942> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: I am Jehovah <WH3068> who halloweth you <WH6942>,
who brought you out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, to be your God <WH430>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>.
